ul.li: "bottom left" and "left bottom" mean the same as "0%100%".

body.p: If statement above is passed, this paragraph should have a flag image which is to the bottom left of this paragraph text. The rule "p {background-image: url(flagbg.gif)}" is also applied above. All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above (except for color). However, it may not be long enough to support a background image. Also "p {background-repeat: no-repeat;}".
